Formatting Tips

  • Lordbug 00:03, 5 March 2008 (CET)
  • ~~~~
    • Places automatically your Username and the current time.

Text

Links (internal)

Simple

  • Main Page
  • [[Main Page]]
  • Non-Existent Page
  • [[Non-Existent Page]]

Custom text

  • Main Page Page with a different text
  • *[[Main Page|The Main Page with a different text]]
  • The Non-Existent Page with a different text
  • *[[Non-Existent Page|The Non-Existent Page with a different text]]

Links (External)

Simple

  • http://peragro.org/
  • http://peragro.org/

Custom Text

  • Peragro Tempus Website
  • [http://peragro.org/ Peragro Tempus Website] (note the space)

Blend Text with Link

  • Main Pages
  • [[Main Page]]s

Un-Blend Text from Link

  • Main Pages
  • [[Main Page]]<nowiki>s</nowiki>

Links to the same page

  • #Text
  • [[#Text]]
  • Text Formatting Tips
  • [[#Text|Text Formatting Tips]]

Redirect to another Page

  • Use the following tag to redirect a link to the page you want:
  • #REDIRECT [[Name of the Page]]

or

  • #REDIRECT [[Name of the Page#Topic]]

When someone clicks a link with a redirection he or she will end up directly in the page you redirected it to.
Useful when you haven't yet written full information on something but you'd like to point something towards a page which already contains a short summary.

Images

Insert an Image

  • [[Image:Clock_half.png]]

Alternate Text on Image

  • *[[Image:Clock_half.png|Alternate Text]]

Link to an Image

  • Shown Text
  • [[:Image:Clock_half.png|Shown Text]]

Resize an Image

  • [[Image:Clock_half.png|100 px]]
